examples: The diamond thief double-crossed his partners and gave them only worthless fake jewels.
My mom stuffs pimientos with cream cheese and serves them as an appetizer at parties.
"And pigs can fly!"
I discovered the delightful combination of pawpaw and coconut in a tropical fruit salad.
The child jumped up and down with excitement.
words.defineEn: used to connect two words, phrases, or sentences referring to related things
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để kết nối hai từ, cụm từ hoặc câu đề cập đến những điều liên quan

examples: Come rain or shine.
Harassment or bullying is unacceptable behavior in the workplace.
Sooner or later she's going to realize what a mistake she's made.
Get a move on or you'll be late.
It was now or never.
words.defineEn: used to connect alternatives or introduce another possibility
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để kết nối các lựa chọn thay thế hoặc giới thiệu một khả năng khác

examples: But a truck driver saved her bacon.
My friends all had a good laugh, but at my expense.
but I have mixed feelings about him
A wonder lasts but nine days.
But this bird was as dead as a dodo.
words.defineEn: used for introducing a word, phrase, or idea that is different to what has already been said
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để giới thiệu một từ, cụm từ hoặc ý tưởng khác với những gì đã được nói

examples: The sky, as if on cue, was overcast.
If the company faces legal trouble, having a friend at court with the judge could make a significant difference in the outcome.
If you're planning anything, tomorrow's the time.
If he wants to write a book, more power to his elbow!
The Council is the Achilles heel of European democracy, if not the black hole.
words.defineEn: in the event of; depending on another event
words.defineVi: trong trường hợp của; tùy thuộc vào một sự kiện khác

examples: The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
My vegetarian friend often uses beans as a filling for vegetarian tacos.
As kids we used to fight like cats and dogs.
People around the world enjoy various forms of music as a universal language.
The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
words.defineEn: used to say that something is happening at the same time with another
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói rằng một cái gì đó đang xảy ra cùng một lúc với một cái khác

examples: The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
I always put my important documents in a safe deposit box at the bank because safe bind, safe find.
Of course, there's method in her madness because an empty fridge means I have to take her out to dinner.
I hate spicy food because it burns my mouth.
He pickled slices of beets because his wife enjoys them.
words.defineEn: used for introducing the reason of something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để giới thiệu lý do của một cái gì đó

examples: The vibrant orange color of a ripe nectarine is so appealing.
so I ate my fill.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
So, did you get the promotion?
So who spilled the beans about her affair with David?
words.defineEn: used to summarize or draw a conclusion based on previous information or to provide a logical inference
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để tóm tắt hoặc đưa ra kết luận dựa trên thông tin trước đó hoặc để cung cấp một suy luận logic

examples: Since the forties he has led his own big bands.
The company has held the advertising contract since 2005.
Things have changed dramatically since then.
Almost fifty years have passed since that day.
That monument has been there since the year one.
words.defineEn: from a time in the past until a particular time, typically the present
words.defineVi: từ một thời điểm trong quá khứ cho đến một thời điểm cụ thể, điển hình là hiện tại

examples: Unemployment has now passed the three million mark.
95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
The U.S. tax code now loads the dice in favor of private pension plans.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
The conflict has now reached a new level of intensity.
words.defineEn: because of what has just been said or happened
words.defineVi: vì những gì vừa được nói hoặc xảy ra

examples: After all, one case of the trots hardly spells disaster.
Every age has its book, after all.
After all, love will find a way.
After all, an electrical brain is smarter than the sum of its parts.
A new broom sweeps clean, after all.
words.defineEn: when something has finished; ‌at a time later than something
words.defineVi: khi một cái gì đó đã hoàn thành; ‌tại một thời điểm muộn hơn một cái gì đó

examples: The actress was practicing her lines before the audition.
Her life had always run smoothly before.
We have had these mysteries before.
Have you ever used this software before?
The case was tried before a jury.
words.defineEn: earlier than a particular action or event
words.defineVi: sớm hơn một hành động hoặc sự kiện cụ thể

examples: had a stab at surfing once
The committee meets once a fortnight.
My family goes on a vacation once a year.
She once went down that political rabbit hole.
I do aerobics once a week.
words.defineEn: at the time something else happens
words.defineVi: tại thời điểm một cái gì đó khác xảy ra

examples: The private finance initiative has not papered over the cracks, although it has lined plenty of pockets.
Although I'm not showing yet, my baby is due in the spring.
Although the pandemic caused a great deal of disruption and hardship, it also forced many people to reevaluate their priorities and appreciate the important things in life.
Although I missed my flight, I ended up meeting my future spouse in the airport lounge.
Although the job paid well, I couldn't stand the way I was under the boss's thumb.
words.defineEn: despite what has just been said
words.defineVi: bất chấp những gì vừa được nói

examples: Though I still liked it.
Some of us, though, actually have to apply for jobs.
It looks to me as though the company is in real trouble.
John still carries a torch for Mary, even though they broke up years ago.
You look as though you slept badly.
words.defineEn: used to say something surprising compared to the main idea
words.defineVi: dùng để nói điều gì đó gây ngạc nhiên so với ý chính

examples: That holiday cost me a small fortune.
That movie knocked my socks off.
That accident battered up the door of my car.
That shot lost him the championship.
lose that creep!
words.defineEn: used to introduce a statement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để giới thiệu một tuyên bố

examples: Yet, for the moment anyway, the bankers have lost their Midas touch.
Has your headache gone yet?
Has the postman been yet?
His parents have not yet reached retirement age.
Yet another candidate has thrown his hat into the ring.
words.defineEn: used to add a statement that is surprising compared to what has just been said
words.defineVi: dùng để thêm vào một câu nói gây ngạc nhiên so với điều vừa nói

examples: When does the train go?
When does the concert begin?
When his head broke the surface he took in deep gulps of air.
So when will you deliver the cargo?
When he starts a job he goes at it hammer and tongs.
words.defineEn: during or at the time something else happens
words.defineVi: trong hoặc tại thời điểm một cái gì đó khác xảy ra

examples: Whenever we go out, my father picks up the tab.
Whenever I hear that music, I feel a shiver down my spine.
Whenever I grill chicken, I love brushing it with a glaze made from king orange juice.
Jack vented his spleen at his wife whenever things went badly at work.
She pulls a face at her brother whenever he teases her.
words.defineEn: at any or every time
words.defineVi: bất cứ lúc nào hoặc mọi lúc

examples: Where do you keep the scissors?
Where did you get that skirt?
Where did you buy that dress?
Where do you live?
"Where have you been?"
words.defineEn: used to refer to a particular situation, stage, or place
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ một tình huống, giai đoạn hoặc địa điểm cụ thể

examples: Their project is hitting the mark, whereas ours is just flopping.
Whereas AirPods last up to five hours of constant listening.
Whereas the permissive parent often caves to their child's demands and exerts little control over any of the child's behavior.
Whereas, the original Google Home just had one speaker.
Whereas most people around here don't!
words.defineEn: used to introduce a statement that is true for one thing and false for another
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để giới thiệu một tuyên bố đó là đúng cho một điều và sai cho một điều khác

examples: Time will tell whether we made the right decision.
Only time will tell whether Broughton's optimism is justified.
A number of factors decide whether a movie will be successful or not.
In that embarrassment of riches, some people might wonder whether we need another service area at all.
Whether you take the scenic route or the highway, it makes no odds to the length of the journey.
words.defineEn: used to talk about a doubt or choice when facing two options
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói về một sự nghi ngờ hoặc lựa chọn khi đối mặt với hai lựa chọn

examples: The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
Parents often support their children financially during college.
The children had pillow fights during their sleepover.
The rookie player made his bow on the field during the championship game.
The children spread cheese dip on crackers during their picnic in the park.
words.defineEn: all through a period of time; from the beginning to the end of a period of time
words.defineVi: tất cả trong một khoảng thời gian; từ đầu đến cuối một khoảng thời gian

examples: The skinless tilapia fillets were pan-fried until crispy.
The plans are on hold until after the election.
Breakfast is served until 9 am.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
The pair went toe to toe until the third set, when Azarenka squandered two match points.
words.defineEn: happening up to a specific point in time and stopping after that time
words.defineVi: xảy ra đến một thời điểm cụ thể và dừng lại sau thời điểm đó

examples: The film received lavish praise from critics for its groundbreaking visual effects, compelling storyline, and outstanding performances.
The teacher withdrew the assignment from the class website.
The machine takes its name from its inventor.
The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
The farmer harvested the fresh broccoli florets from the garden for market.
words.defineEn: used for showing the place where a person or thing comes from
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị nơi mà một người hoặc vật đến từ

examples: The brochure speaks of beautiful secluded grounds.
What's your shirt made of?
Ha, yeah right, and the moon is made of cheese.
The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
words.defineEn: belonging to someone or something; relating to someone or something
words.defineVi: thuộc về ai đó hoặc cái gì đó; liên quan đến một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: The organization supports various charitable causes through donations.
The increase had a ripple effect through the whole financial market.
The captain navigated the ship through rough waters with skill and expertise.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The road continues through the village of Knightwick.
words.defineEn: from one side of something or someone to the other; into one side something and out of the other side
words.defineVi: từ một phía của một cái gì đó hoặc một người khác; vào một bên một cái gì đó và ra khỏi phía bên kia

examples: He would have had a perfect game, except he walked a batter in the final inning.
Mark's friend had passed away, and he found that all things grow with time except grief, as he slowly learned to cope with the loss and cherish the memories they shared.
Trauma surgeons work tirelessly to save lives, but ultimately they realize there is a remedy for everything except death and must accept that some injuries are simply too severe.
We used to say in this country, excepting Vietnam, that the country had never lost a war.
Except, chemical engines also have a pretty big downside.
words.defineEn: not including; other than
words.defineVi: không bao gồm; khác với

examples: The novel is worlds apart from his academic writings.
The singer is the poster boy for the new wave of indie music, with his unique sound and style setting him apart from the mainstream.
In the world of fashion design, he is of the first water, with a unique and innovative style that sets him apart from his peers.
Apart from one special nest in the middle of the network, which is reserved for the queen and her guards.
Wayfair's business model stands apart from the competition for a couple of different reasons.
words.defineEn: except for
words.defineVi: ngoại trừ

examples: He danced the issue around.
The goldfish in the bowl was swimming around happily.
One of them was glancing nervously around.
A bus appeared around the corner.
People around the world enjoy various forms of music as a universal language.
words.defineEn: on every side of; surrounding someone or something
words.defineVi: ở mọi phía của; xung quanh một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: A stream of black cars drove by.
A stream of black cars drove by.
The fast runner won the race by a wide margin.
By making her jump through the hoops?
The chef impressed the customers by his special dish of button mushrooms with crumbled feta cheese.
words.defineEn: indicating the means of doing or achieving something
words.defineVi: chỉ ra các phương tiện để làm hoặc đạt được một cái gì đó

examples: A large bus was sitting outside.
The temperature outside is nineteen degrees Celsius.
The trail starts just outside the town.
The children are playing outside in the park.
Two huge fountains were playing outside the entrance.
words.defineEn: on or to a place on the outside of something
words.defineVi: trên hoặc đến một nơi ở bên ngoài của một cái gì đó

examples: The dog has gone inside.
She knows the business inside out.
He accidentally put his underwear on inside out.
A lot has happened inside these four walls.
She reached inside her bag for a pen.
words.defineEn: on or to the inner part of something or someone; within someone or something
words.defineVi: trên hoặc phần bên trong của một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó; trong một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: Police still haven't made heads nor tails of the heist.
I can’t get hold of that book for love nor money.
The prophet and his God felt as one, but that attachment cannot be felt nor understood by the common folk.
Medical interns are neither fish nor fowl.
They are neither students nor fully qualified practitioners.
words.defineEn: put before a positive verb to express agreement with the preceding negative statement
words.defineVi: đặt trước động từ khẳng định để bày tỏ sự đồng tình với mệnh đề phủ định trước đó

examples: The company kicked off the CEO for embezzlement.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
The director praised the actor for their outstanding performance in the movie.
The doctor examined her neck for any signs of injury.
Even the experts took the painting for a genuine Van Gogh.
words.defineEn: used to indicate who is supposed to have or use something or where something is intended to be put
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để cho biết ai được cho là có hoặc sử dụng thứ gì đó hoặc nơi dự định đặt thứ gì đó

examples: Better ask teacher about.
I just about busted a gut.
The boss of the failed company is keeping schtum about his role in the disaster.
The plane holds about 300 passengers.
The plane holds about 300 passengers.
words.defineEn: on the matters that concern or relate to a specific subject
words.defineVi: về các vấn đề liên quan hoặc liên quan đến một chủ đề cụ thể

examples: The boat hit against an object under the surface of the water.
The waves drove against the shore.
The body's immune system protects against harmful bacteria and viruses.
Someone has stacked the cards against me.
She pressed her cheek against the cool glass window.
words.defineEn: in opposition to someone or something
words.defineVi: đối lập với một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: Better one house spoiled than two.
The pen is mightier than the sword.
A live dog is better than a dead lion.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The whole is sometime less than the sum of its parts.
words.defineEn: used to add a second part to a comparison
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thêm một phần thứ hai để so sánh

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: sharing the same qualities or features
words.defineVi: chia sẻ những phẩm chất hoặc tính năng giống nhau
